Use Robert Gregg's implementation of HALS for NMF in Julia

Source: R/juliaNMF.R
nmf_HALS.Rd

Use Robert Gregg's implementation of HALS for NMF in Julia

Usage

nmf_HALS(x, r, alpha = 0.2, maxiter = 250)

Arguments

x

matrix

r

target rank

alpha

regularization factor, defaults to 0.2

maxiter

numeric, passed to julia

Value

a list with elements, X, W, H, res, call

Examples

mym = matrix(1:100,nr=10)*1.0
nn = nmf_HALS(mym, 4)
#> Julia version 1.11.3 at location /Users/vincentcarey/.julia/juliaup/julia-1.11.3+0.aarch64.apple.darwin14/bin will be used.
#> Loading setup script for JuliaCall...
#> Finish loading setup script for JuliaCall.
nn$res
#> [1] 0.001308478
rec = nn$W %*% t(nn$H)
rec[1:4,1:4]
#>          [,1]     [,2]     [,3]     [,4]
#> [1,] 1.178223 10.97213 20.97057 30.96901
#> [2,] 2.129378 11.96334 21.96210 31.96086
#> [3,] 3.182175 12.93516 22.93356 32.93196
#> [4,] 4.164033 13.93045 23.93042 33.93038
